about_the_game:
This is the OST of the game G-STRING.

128 tracks arranged into a seamless 5 hour and 45 minute long experience.
For convenience the mix has been divided into separate FLAC (lossless) files.

All tracks have been mixed together with sounds and dialog from the game to create a lengthy, smooth experience that evokes the events and mood of G-String.

content_descriptors.notes: A few tracks have a some sexually suggestive sound effects but nothing too explicit.

detailed_description:
This is the OST of the game G-STRING.

128 tracks arranged into a seamless 5 hour and 45 minute long experience.
For convenience the mix has been divided into separate FLAC (lossless) files.

All tracks have been mixed together with sounds and dialog from the game to create a lengthy, smooth experience that evokes the events and mood of G-String.
legal_notice:

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Storage: 700 MB available space
  • Storage (high-quality audio): Additional 2200 MB available space
  • Additional Notes: G String Original Soundtrack

short_description: G-STRING ORIGINAL SOUNDTRACK128 tracks mixed together with sounds and dialog from G-String to create a more interesting experience that evokes the events and mood of the base game.
